import React, { useState } from "react" import "../Game/Game.css" import { kahoot } from "../../const/fakeDatabase" export default function GameClient() { let array = kahoot[0].games[0].quastions[1] const [answerChoice, setChoice] = useState(array.answers[0]) console.log(array.rightAnswer) console.log(answerChoice) return (
{!answerChoice ?
